ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISBLANK( Event__c ), ISBLANK( Exhibit__c ), ISBLANK( GES_Connect_Event__c ), ISBLANK( Meeting_Room__c ), ISBLANK( Speaking_Engagement__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Brand Should have a look-Up with at lest one of the following objects -> Event , Exhibit , GES Connect Event , Meeting Room , Speaking Engagement .
